message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for $1500000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a truly valuable item that I'm confident you won't find elsewhere.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I believe the product's value is worth more than your initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $1250000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1100000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make it work within my means.
